summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Government Performance and Financial Management Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on February 26, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Briefing Room, City Hall. The meeting will be accessible both in-person and via video conference, with the purpose of discussing various financial and operational matters affecting the city.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the January 22, 2024 meeting.
2. Briefings on the Dallas Central Appraisal Districtâ€™s proposed budget and reappraisal plans.
3. Overview of Artificial Intelligence initiatives within the city.
4. Discussion on the procurement solicitation and evaluation process.
5. Updates on major maintenance projects at Dallas City Hall.

**Important Details**:  
- The committee will review the monthly performance update from Development Services, including process map improvements.
- A memorandum on the review of city real estate for development opportunities will be presented.
- The agenda includes several reports, such as the annual investment policy review and quarterly investment reports.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the meeting minutes and discuss various proposals, including vendor contract renewals for employee health benefits and FMLA services. Additionally, there will be discussions on upcoming agenda items regarding reprogramming city funding and reallocating ARPA funds. The meeting may also include an executive session to discuss sensitive legal and financial matters.
